    watch: {
    'form.city_id'(newVal, oldVal) {
      if (this.$refs.cascader) {
        this.$refs.cascader.dropDownVisible = false

    é™„ä¸ŠHTML

    ```````<el-cascader
          ref="cascader"
          v-model="form.city_id"
          clearable
          :show-all-levels="false"
          :options="$store.state.menu.city"
          :props="{
            expandTrigger: 'hover',
            value: 'id',

            children: 'childTree',
